summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4732 for the improvement of 1st Avenue South, from Jackson Street to Hanford Street; by the construction of a street lighting System and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54748 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
